sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description/>
        <name>De-Activate Public Key Auth in SCP</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[deactivateUnsupportedPublicKeyOptionFromSCP();

        function deactivateUnsupportedPublicKeyOptionFromSCP() {
            var choiceGlideRecord = new GlideRecord('sys_choice');
            choiceGlideRecord.addQuery('name','sys_data_source');
            choiceGlideRecord.addQuery('element', 'scp_authentication');
            choiceGlideRecord.addQuery('value','Public key');
            choiceGlideRecord.setLimit(1);
            choiceGlideRecord.query();
            if(choiceGlideRecord.next())	{
                choiceGlideRecord.setValue('inactive', 1);
                choiceGlideRecord.update();
            }
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2019-10-14 19:49:35</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>182cb4f0772000107b2380733b106120</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>De-Activate Public Key Auth in SCP</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="System Import Data Source" source="com.glide.system_import_data_source">205d38876d2220100acb70b353433035</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_182cb4f0772000107b2380733b106120</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2019-10-14 19:49:35</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>true</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: De-Activate Public Key Auth in SCP
